name: Bitdefender Antivirus Quarantine File
summary: A GZQUAR file is a file that has been quarantined by Bitdefender Antivirus Free Edition, a Windows security program used to protect a computer from malware . It most likely contains a virus and is quarantined in Bitdefender Antivirus Free Edition to block the malicious file from being executed and spreading to other data on the computer.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
